rules_text: {1}{R}: Target opponent gains control of another permanent you control. Put two fuse counters on that permanent. It gains “At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fuse counter from this” and “When the last fuse counter is removed from this, sacrifice it and it deals 4 damage to you.” [i](You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.
